definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Modify your diet to exclude or limit dairy products, alcohol, smoking or other stimulants.
sentences.chinese: 不喫或少喫乳製品，儘量不要接近菸酒或其他刺激物。

sentences.english: Chinese consumers responded by avoiding locally-produced milk products.
sentences.chinese: 面對這種情況，中國消費者開始避開國產乳製品。

sentences.english: Public health demands that milk and all milk products should be pure and wholesome.
sentences.chinese: 公共衛生要求乳品和所有乳製品應該是純淨衛生的。

sentences.english: They were at school on Monday, February 2nd.
sentences.chinese: 七月七號，星期六那天他們在乳製品店裏。

sentences.english: Several Chinese dairies are suspected of negligence in allowing the distribution of tainted milk products.
sentences.chinese: 幾個中國牛奶場被懷疑在有毒乳製品散佈上的有疏漏。

sentences.english: Many parents fear that removing dairy products will hurt their child due to the calcium they will lose.
sentences.chinese: 很多父母擔心不喫乳製品孩子會缺鈣。

sentences.english: The deal is with Yili, China’s leading dairy products company.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司是中國知名的乳製品公司伊利集團。

sentences.english: Avoid drinking or eating unpasteurized dairy products.
sentences.chinese: 不要喫或喝未經消毒的乳製品。

sentences.english: My hometown produces many dairy products.
China's dairy industry has boomed over the past five years.
sentences.chinese: 中國的乳製品業在過去五年獲得了繁榮發展。

sentences.english: Lacto vegetarians eat only plant foods and dairy products.
sentences.chinese: 乳素食者只吃一些植物食品和乳製品。

sentences.english: For instance, more dairy intake may mean less soda intake.
sentences.chinese: 舉了例子，更多的乳製品被吸收會減少蘇打的吸收量。

sentences.english: Dairy blocks capsaicin's sweat-inducing signals better than water.
sentences.chinese: 每天喫含誘導出汗的辣椒素乳製品比喝水好。

sentences.english: When were they at the greengrocer's?
sentences.chinese: 七月七號，星期六那天他們在乳製品店裏。

sentences.english: You can freeze many dairy products, so stock up during sales.
sentences.chinese: 你可以冷藏很多乳製品，所以應該在降價時儲存滿。

sentences.english: The situation caused recalls of Chinese dairy products all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 這一情況的發生導致全世界的中國乳製品被召回。

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
